definition: mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable
dew/syrup/nectar/outdoors (not under cover)/to show/to reveal/to betray/to expose
water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes

sentences.english: True happiness is of a retired nature, and enemy to pomp and noise.
sentences.chinese: 真正的幸福不显山露水，它摈弃浮华和喧嚣。

sentences.english: The ability to simplify means to eliminate the unnecessary so that the necessary may speak.
sentences.chinese: 简化，就是消除不必要的，必要的才显山露水。

sentences.english: It has come to the surface over the last few years.
sentences.chinese: 他在过去几年中终于开始显山露水。

sentences.english: Until he fully when he captured your mediocrity would be.
sentences.chinese: 等他完全俘虏你的心时，他的平庸就显山露水了。

sentences.english: True happiness is of a retired nature, and an enemy to pomp and noises;
sentences.chinese: 真正的幸福不显山露水，它摒弃浮华和喧嚣。

definition: lit. to not show the mountain and to not reveal the water (idiom); fig. to hide the key facts
pinyin: bu4 xian3 shan1 bu4 lu4 shui3

definition: to conceal one's strengths and bide one's time (idiom)/to hide one's light under a bushel
avoiding doing something that one is clumsy at to save face
long sleeves help one dance beautifully (idiom); money and power will help you in any occupation
to appear/to come out in the open
lit. to have accumulated knowledge and deliver it slowly (idiom)/good preparation is the key to success/to be well prepared
